id.description: Unique identifier for the function within the pre/post block

meta.description: Abitrary meta data that you may use to describe the function.

handler.description: Identifer of the function handler that will be invoked (must be registered with the workflow engine).

args.description: Abitrary object of data that will be passed to the function handler when executued (along with the instance state, etc.)

condition.description: Optional condition object that will determine whether or not the function is executed
